name: Vitamix® Guacamole Sarah's Way
author: Rachel Meytin
summary: Delicious guacamole and crazy easy to make. If your avocados are large, you can use three. Don't skimp on the salt or over-do the lemon. Lime juice can be substituted for the lemon juice. Take the seeds out of the jalapeno pepper for less heat. Otherwise it's pretty fail-safe. We've created many new guacamole fans by this recipe!
ingredients: ½  jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced  (Optional)
directions: Blend avocados, tomato, onion, lemon juice, jalapeno pepper, and salt in a Vitamix® blender on variable 2 or on the low setting on any blender until guacamole is chunky
